md:
giải nghĩa từ "slipped" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

Slipped (verb) - Đã trượt, đã tuột

* Meaning: Past tense of "slip", which means to accidentally fall or slide from a position or to make a mistake.
* Example sentence: "She slipped on the banana peel and fell down."
* Related words: slip, slide, fall, mistake
* Synonyms: fell, dropped, stumbled

Slipped (past participle) - Đã trượt, đã tuột

* Meaning: Used to describe an action that happened in the past and has a connection to the present.
* Example sentence: "The dog had slipped out of the house before I could catch it."
* Related words: slip, slide, fall, escape
* Synonyms: escaped, fled, got away

Slipped (adjective) - Trượt, tuột

* Meaning: Describing something that is loose or not secure.
* Example sentence: "The slipped stitch on the sweater made it look uneven."
* Related words: loose, insecure, unstable
* Synonyms: loose, undone, unfastened
